entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING WEST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
